get.description: Returns a list of Muntra Caregiver Locations based on the specified filters

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: List of additional includes in response, e.g. clinic,caregiver,free_bookable_slots,procedures,default_procedure,next_free_bookable_slot

parameters.name: role_ids
parameters.description: List of role ids for filtering

parameters.name: procedure_ids
parameters.description: List of procedures for filtering caregiver_at_locations records

parameters.name: new_patient
parameters.description: Parameter for new patient procedure duration.

parameters.name: include_caregiver_locations_without_procedure_id_matches
parameters.description: Include caregiver_locations relations without requested procedures

parameters.name: dtstart
parameters.description: Current datetime with ISO format for defining free bookable slots

parameters.name: dtend
parameters.description: End of a day (current + 3 days) with ISO format for defining free bookable slots

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of requested location for sorting results with the distance

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude of requested location for sorting results with the distance

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in kilometers for result limitation with the distance

parameters.name: clinic_id
parameters.description: Clinic ID of clinic at locations records

parameters.name: caregiver_id
parameters.description: Caregiver ID of clinic at locations records

message.example: Please make request with all required query parameters

items.example: The dtstart is not a valid date.
The dtend field is required when dtstart is present.
The lng field is required when lat is present.
The lat field is required when lng is present.
The viewport_northeast_lat field is required when viewport_northeast_lng,viewport_southwest_lat,viewport_southwest_lng is present.
The viewport_northeast_lng field is required when viewport_northeast_lat,viewport_southwest_lat,viewport_southwest_lng is present.
The viewport_northeast_lng field is required when viewport_northeast_lng,viewport_northeast_lat,viewport_southwest_lng is present.
The viewport_northeast_lng field is required when viewport_northeast_lng,viewport_northeast_lat,viewport_southwest_lat is present.
